With this release, you can now:
-Explore more detailed charts with 50+ technical indicators, point plotting and more
-Receive notifications about stocks you follow, including all-time highs and lows, real-time earnings and significant price changes
-Expand and collapse your watchlists on the Home tab
-Show and hide your total holdings by tapping the value

We’ve also refreshed the overall look and feel of the app to make it even simpler to discover and track investments. Stay tuned for more!

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback helps make Yahoo Finance even better.

With this release, you can now listen to videos even when the app is in the background. To do this, just start watching a video and leave the app - the audio will continue to play. You can use your device's built-in controls to pause and resume the audio track or change the volume.

This release also includes the addition of a new chart indicator, the Anchored VWAP (Volume Weighted Average Price).

With this release, you can now listen to videos even when the app is in the background. To do this, just start watching a video and leave the app - the audio will continue to play. You can use your device's built-in controls to pause and resume the audio track or change the volume.

This release also includes the addition of a new chart indicator, the Anchored VWAP (Volume Weighted Average Price).

Hi Finance fans! We addressed some issues with charts and video experiences in the app. Please continue sharing bugs and ideas through the "Send feedback" link in the sidebar. Thanks for your support!

Hi Finance fans! We addressed some issues with charts and video experiences in the app. Please continue sharing bugs and ideas through the "Send feedback" link in the sidebar. Thanks for your support!

Bullish, bearish, or neutral? You can now share your sentiment by creating a post in the Conversations view. Get to it from a symbol's Summary page.

Hungry for data? We've added additional information such as historical financials and analysts' recommendations in the Details tab, also accessible from a symbol's Summary page.

We freshened up the look and feel of our app! The goal of this is to improve readability of features such as the market header on the Home tab. Please tell us what you think by using the "Send feedback" option in the side menu, and stay tuned for more improvements. Enjoy!

Please update to iOS 12+ to take advantage of new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements in Yahoo Finance. Our updates will no longer support iOS 11 as we focus on providing you with the best investment tools and content.

Please update to iOS 12+ to take advantage of new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements in Yahoo Finance. Our updates will no longer support iOS 11 as we focus on providing you with the best investment tools and content.

Premium subscribers: this release includes an updated experience that makes it easier to view and filter Research Reports and Investment Ideas. Select "View all" from the Premium Dashboard or "All reports" or "All investment ideas" from a quote page to check it out.

We acted on your feedback! You can now distinguish Yahoo Finance notifications by selecting from a list of custom sounds. Custom sounds can be found in Account > Settings > Notifications > Notification Sounds.

This release also addresses the issue where some users were not seeing stock options prices on the Details tab of the quote page.

As always, share your thoughts on the app using the "Send feedback" link in Account > Settings. Thanks for using Yahoo Finance!
